  4.  def apply(implementation: BackofficeService, prefix: String, eHandler: (ActorSystem) => PartialFunction[Throwable, Trailers])(implicit system: ClassicActorSystemProvider): (HttpRequest) => Future[HttpResponse]

    Creates a HttpRequest to HttpResponse handler that can be used in for example Http().bindAndHandleAsync for the generated partial function handler and ends with StatusCodes.NotFound if the request is not matching.

    Creates a HttpRequest to HttpResponse handler that can be used in for example Http().bindAndHandleAsync for the generated partial function handler and ends with StatusCodes.NotFound if the request is not matching.

    Use akka.grpc.scaladsl.ServiceHandler.concatOrNotFound with BackofficeServiceHandler.partial when combining several services.

    Registering a gRPC service under a custom prefix is not widely supported and strongly discouraged by the specification.

  18.  def partial(implementation: BackofficeService, prefix: String = BackofficeService.name, eHandler: (ActorSystem) => PartialFunction[Throwable, Trailers] = GrpcExceptionHandler.defaultMapper)(implicit system: ClassicActorSystemProvider): PartialFunction[HttpRequest, Future[HttpResponse]]

    Creates a partial HttpRequest to HttpResponse handler that can be combined with handlers of other services with akka.grpc.scaladsl.ServiceHandler.concatOrNotFound and then used in for example Http().bindAndHandleAsync.

    Creates a partial HttpRequest to HttpResponse handler that can be combined with handlers of other services with akka.grpc.scaladsl.ServiceHandler.concatOrNotFound and then used in for example Http().bindAndHandleAsync.

    Use BackofficeServiceHandler.apply if the server is only handling one service.

    Registering a gRPC service under a custom prefix is not widely supported and strongly discouraged by the specification.

  24.  def withServerReflection(implementation: BackofficeService)(implicit system: ClassicActorSystemProvider): (HttpRequest) => Future[HttpResponse]

    Creates a HttpRequest to HttpResponse handler that can be used in for example Http().bindAndHandleAsync for the generated partial function handler.

    Creates a HttpRequest to HttpResponse handler that can be used in for example Http().bindAndHandleAsync for the generated partial function handler. The generated handler falls back to a reflection handler for BackofficeService and ends with StatusCodes.NotFound if the request is not matching.

    Use akka.grpc.scaladsl.ServiceHandler.concatOrNotFound with BackofficeServiceHandler.partial when combining several services.
